/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.title: external-dns helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.name: external-dns
/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.doc: ExternalDNS is a Kubernetes add-on that automatically manages the creation and updates of DNS records for services running in your cluster. It integrates with a variety of DNS providers, such as CloudFlare DNS, Amazon Route 53, Google Cloud DNS, and more, to ensure that your applications are easily accessible from anywhere with a DNS name. With ExternalDNS, you can simplify the process of managing DNS records for your home lab, eliminating the need for manual updates and reducing the risk of errors.

0: if [ $(curl -s https://ipinfo.io/country) = "${VPN_COUNTRY}" ]; then exit 0; else exit $?; fi

- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__LOAD_EXAMPLES
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__HIDE_SENSITIVE_VAR_CONN_FIELDS
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__DEFAULT_TIMEZONE
  value: Australia/Perth
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__BASE_URL
  value: 'https://airflow.${SECRET_DOMAIN}'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__DEFAULT_WRAP
  value: 'True'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__EXPOSE_CONFIG
  value: 'True'

- secretRef:
    name: airflow-secrets
- configMapRef:
    name: airflow-user-config
